trans-unit.source: Implement and attach to a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" /> object to control how the importer maps Web Services Description Language (WSDL) parts to those of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 請實作並附加至 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" /> 物件，以控制匯入工具如何將 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 部分對應至 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 物件的部分。

trans-unit.source: Implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> interface to control the mapping between WSDL and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects, especially when reading custom WSDL extensions to modify your contract or endpoint information.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> 介面，以控制 WSDL 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> 物件之間的對應，特別是當讀取自訂 WSDL 延伸以修改您的合約或端點資訊時。

trans-unit.source: Then attach your custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> object to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> either programmatically or by using an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 然後以程式設計的方法或使用應用程式組態檔，將您的自訂 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> 物件附加至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>。

trans-unit.source: You can also attach your custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> object to the internal <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> used by the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md) using an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以附加您的自訂<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension>物件到內部<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>供[ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)使用應用程式組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> method is called to import a contract.
trans-unit.target: 會呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> 方法來匯入合約。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A> method to modify the metadata that is then imported into <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A> 方法來修改接著匯入至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> 物件的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> to add an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> and an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> (the `WsdlDocumentationImporter`, in this case) to modify generated [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client code at the interface and operation level.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> 來加入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在此例中為 `WsdlDocumentationImporter`)，以便在介面和作業層級上修改產生的 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to configure the client metadata system to use the custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何設定用戶端中繼資料系統，以便從應用程式組態檔使用自訂 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension>。

trans-unit.source: The service descriptions to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The schema collection to be used when importing.
trans-unit.target: 要在匯入時使用的結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: The policy assertions used when importing.
trans-unit.target: 在匯入時使用的原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: Called prior to importing metadata documents.
trans-unit.target: 在匯入中繼資料文件之前呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A> methods of all registered <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> objects is called before anything is imported from the supplied metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在從提供的中繼資料匯入任何內容之前，會呼叫所有註冊的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A> 物件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The importer.
trans-unit.target: 匯入工具。

trans-unit.source: The import context to be modified.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的匯入內容。

trans-unit.source: Called when importing a contract.
trans-unit.target: 在匯入合約時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> method is called when a contract is being imported.
trans-unit.target: 當合約正在匯入時，會呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the contract or insert other exporting behaviors such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> and an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> objects to modify the code that is generated for the contract.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改合約或插入其他的匯出行為，例如 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> 物件，以修改針對合約所產生的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> to add an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> and an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> (the `WsdlDocumentationImporter`, in this case) to modify generated [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client code at the interface and operation level.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> 來加入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在此例中為 `WsdlDocumentationImporter`)，以便在介面和作業層級上修改產生的 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to configure the client metadata system to use the custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何設定用戶端中繼資料系統，以便從應用程式組態檔使用自訂 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension>。

trans-unit.source: The importer.
trans-unit.target: 匯入工具。

trans-unit.source: The import context to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的匯入內容。

trans-unit.source: Called when importing an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 在匯入端點時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A> method is called when importing an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 當匯入端點時，會呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Modify the context properties to customize the imported endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 請修改內容屬性以自訂匯入的端點。
